Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 63rd overall pick, by Boston in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Daniel Helmer (SEA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/9/2015, off Jack Teed (SLB)...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/9/2016 to a 3-year deal worth $13,380,001 per year...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/14/2016 with a Fractured Wrist, out for 6 weeks...
Traded from San Francisco to Atlanta on 2/1/2017 (Going to SF: C Anton Santos, 2B Bruce Soloman. Going to ATL: C Eduardo Chavez, P William Hadfield)...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/2/2019 to a 4-year deal worth $5,460,000 per year...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/6/2019 with a Broken Hip, out for full season...
Injured on 5/12/2020 with a Broken Ribs, out for 6-7 weeks...
